channel.title: Client Background
channel.description: I cant figure out how to change the background to my Client lol...? Idk where the fuck it is. Any better way to find it rather than just searching through files?

item.title: Client Background
item.dc:creator: @omfgahippyno omfgahippyno
item.description:
@omfgahippyno wrote:

look in class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.java and search for png then just enter what u find into the search.
it will mostly be named like the source name.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Background
item.dc:creator: @j19283746 j19283746
item.description:
@j19283746 wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:2, topic:349631”][quote author=j19283746 link=topic=446005.msg3273493#msg3273493 date=1279394385]
I cant figure out how to change the background to my Client lol…? Idk where the fuck it is. Any better way to find it rather than just searching through files?
[/quote]

search through ‘folders’ ahaha
/troll

it might be packed into the cache… so you might wanna use toms cache suite and dump the background

it should be called title.dat in the title jagex archive.[/quote]
MMK Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Client Background
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

R0b1n:

go to files>spirits>title.png change picture save it compile and your done

first of all, not all clients have the same directory and not all clients load sprites through outside folders.
second of all theyre called sprites.
thirdmost the compiler is for the java files, you dont compile the sprites…

Read full topic

item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

j19283746:

I cant figure out how to change the background to my Client lol…? Idk where the fuck it is. Any better way to find it rather than just searching through files?

search through ‘folders’ ahaha
/troll

it might be packed into the cache… so you might wanna use toms cache suite and dump the background

it should be called title.dat in the title jagex archive.
